label: 坂本竜馬
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: さかもと りょうま
説明文: (1835-67). Tosa goshi (merchant origins). Loyalist; associate of Takechi Zuizan. Fled to Satsuma, 1862; organized Kaientai shipping group. Active in bringing about Satsuma-Choshu alliance. With Nakaoka Shintaro, killed by Bakufu agents, December 1867.
